name: Desert Strike: Return to the Gulf
overview: The Middle East. A melting pot of religions, races and conflicting arguments. Without warning, General Kilbaba has emerged from this background and threatened to start Armageddon. The goverments of the world know very little about this menace, but we have enough evidence of his military capabilities to take his threats very seriously. The President has chosen you to fly a series of dangerous pre-emptive desert campaigns to vanquish this inimical despot.
